name: NSFW Roleplay Chat Bot
tagline: Advanced AI roleplay bot with scenario templates and character creation
description: NSFW Roleplay Chat Bot is a Telegram bot designed for immersive adult roleplay experiences. It offers pre-built scenario templates covering various genres from fantasy to modern settings, with detailed character creation. The AI adapts its writing style based on the chosen scenario and maintains narrative consistency. Users can create custom scenarios and share them with the community.
